price: Sun tola ati narratti himattuudha Ilmaan Israa’iil gabra godhachuu keetiin”.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka niʿ'matun tamunnuhā ʿalayya an ʿabbadtta banī is'rāīla
